snippet.title: piercefilm productions
snippet.description:
Welcome to my channel! Here you find my: Sense of Scale documentary. Short films. Commercials. 
Science Fiction. Miniature effects. Fun behind the scenes!

This channel is mainly for my SENSE OF SCALE documentary about film industry model makers. 
The doc focuses on the people and their work. It is self financed, and not from the major studios. 
I wanted to let the model makers tell their own model shop stories from their perspective. Since
the doc is more than 12 hours long, I have broken it up into short segments. Most of the interviews
were recorded from 2010-2012. 

A new segment will be posted every week! Stay tuned. Thanks

Facebook page:
https://www.facebook.com/SenseOfScaleDocumentary/

Director
Writer 
Producer
Designer
Special Effects Miniature Maker
Miniature Effects Director/Supervisor
Editor

Art Center Pasadena Graduate
CONTACT: piercefilm@gmx.net
